entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
